margin-top: 12pt">Exhibit&nbsp;10.13 </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>INTRODUCTION</B> </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Pan American Energy LLC (Sucursal Argentina), oil natural gas production company operates areas Gulf San Jorge Republic Argentina (&#147;PAE&#148;) DLS Argentina Limited &#150; Sucursal Argentina, company specialized drilling completion oil wells rendering services related therewith (&#147;DLS&#148;), decided mutual agreement form long term strategic alliance drilling wells production oil and/or natural gas carrying eventual workover activities, declaring pursue purpose: </DIV> <DIV style="margin-top: 6pt"> <TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt"> <TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent"> <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD> <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#150;</B></TD> <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD> <TD>To drill wells possible, quality suits Pan American, required safety, health environment protection conditions cost convenient parties market conditions.</TD> </TR> </TABLE> </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">To end parties intend: </DIV> <DIV style="margin-top: 6pt"> <TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt"> <TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; Mixed Unit</B> </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">The prices contained present Appendix&nbsp;I expressed Mixed Units, hereinafter MU; MU currency unit defined sole purpose facilitating management prices Agreement.</div> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%"> MU result directly adding amounts US Dollars (USD)&nbsp;and legal tender Argentine Pesos ($) price broken PARTIES agreement. Therefore MU completely defined identifying USD proportion MU, remaining complementary part corresponds $.</div> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%"> The complete notation be: MU(X%USD), means MU composed X% USD (100-X)% $.</div> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%"> For purpose clarifying meaning application MU, examples used: </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">Case 1: 100 MU(30%USD) equivalent USD30 &#043; $70<BR> Case 2: 200 MU (60%USD) equivalent USD120 &#043; $80 </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">In Agreement, price expressed MU(X%USD), amount USD referred USD Portion amount $ referred $ Portion. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">In examples above, case USD Portion 30 $ Portion 70; case, USD Portion 120 $ Portion 80. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%"><B>2.2. <P><HR noshade><P> <H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P> <DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif"> <DIV align="center"> <TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" <TD nowrap align="left">Continuous performance tested</TD> <TD>&nbsp;</TD> <TD>&nbsp;</TD> </TR> <TR style="font-size: 8pt" valign="bottom"> <TD>&nbsp;</TD> <TD>&nbsp;</TD> <TD>&nbsp;</TD> Failure DLS give notice materials equipment deemed free apparent defects.</TD> </TR> <TR> <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD> </TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent"> <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD> <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD> <TD>DLS responsible materials, equipment items provided PAE, good condition order return respond case be. While DLS&#146;s possession, elements deemed DLS&#146;s custody.</TD> </TR> </TABLE> </DIV> <DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">SECTION 11<BR> RELATIONSHIPS DLS. </DIV> <DIV style="margin-top: 6pt"> <TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt"> <TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent"> <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">11.1</TD> <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD> <TD>The creation alliance PAE DLS lead development relationships based mutual trust, sharing operation information and, all, raise companies awareness insure personnel goods, preserve environment constantly improve benefit companies personnel involved.</TD> </TR> <TR> <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD> </TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent"> <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">11.2</TD> <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD> <TD>Both companies share operation information related activities Alliance. margin-top: 12pt"><B>CHAPTER &#150; PRELIMINARY ISSUES</B> </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Definitions. </B>When capital initial, terms meanings assigned thereto: </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Affiliate: </B>means individual legal person which, directly indirectly, controls Offeror, Contractor Company; controlled Offeror, Contractor Company common control Offeror, Contractor Company. For purposes definition, term control consists direct indirect ownership, controlling party, fifty percent (50%) corporate capital shares votes controlled party, ability form corporate latter. In cases indirect ownership capital shares votes, minimum required percentage previously complied Offeror, Contractor Company individuals, entities, corporations associations involved chain control. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Operations Area: </B>means geographic area works built hired services rendered. The contract instrument entered Company parties Company operates Operations Area, operating contract, <I>union transitoria de empresas </I>(similar joint venture) participation instrument, comprised concept. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Acts God Force Majeure:</B> meaning assigned thereto Section&nbsp;25 General Bidding Terms. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>General Bidding Terms: </B>shall General Bidding Terms applicable construction service contracts, entered Company Affiliates, <B>appendices</B>. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Specific Bidding Terms: </B>shall specific requirements tender, bid contracting, technical, operational administrative accounting nature. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Base Documentation: </B>shall General Bidding Terms, Specific Bidding Terms applicable tender, bid contracting additional documentation Company makes makes reference documents, including internal policies standards Company. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Performance Bond:</B> meaning assigned thereto Section&nbsp;26 hereof. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Business Obligations: </B>shall meaning assigned thereto Section&nbsp;5, paragraph, subsection (b)&nbsp;of General Bidding Terms. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Labor Obligations: </B>shall meaning assigned thereto Section&nbsp;5, paragraph, subsection (a)&nbsp;hereof. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Subcontractor: </B>shall meaning assigned thereto item 3.1 General Bidding Terms. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>1. Application:</B> These General Bidding Terms apply, case be, additionally established contracting, works services commissioned <B>Pan American Energy LLC (Sucursal Argentina) </B>or Affiliates (hereinafter &#147;Company&#148;), expressly agreed Company entity appointed Company execute works render service subject-matter call bids, price bid tender awardee (hereinafter &#147;Contractor&#148;). </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">1.1 Any individual legal person intends submit offer, quotation participate call bids, price bid tender (hereinafter &#147;Offeror&#148;), submit, offer, copy General Bidding Terms, duly signed pages; however, requirement execute document oblige Company commission work whatsoever. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">The mandatory submission General Bidding Terms previously required, sole opinion Company, Offeror submitted executed copy prior </DIV> <P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio --> </DIV> <!-- PAGEBREAK --> <P><HR noshade><P> <H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P> <DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif"> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">calls bids tenders. If contracting entered into, stated General Bidding Terms previously submitted (or updating thereof, applicable) applicable purposes deemed ratified Contractor. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">1.2 In General Bidding Terms provided for, obligations Offeror considered obligations Contractor obligations Contractor, applicable, considered obligations Offeror. </DIV> <DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">1.3 The obligations Offeror Contractor hereinafter stated considered <B>minimum requirements </B>for execution works rendering service.
